name: histograph-relationizer
description: UI for creating relations between Histograph PITs

scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development node relationizer-config.js > config.json && watchify -d -t reactify src/index.js -o dist/bundle.js & serve
scripts.production: NODE_ENV=production node relationizer-config.js > config.json && browserify -t reactify -g uglifyify src/index.js -o dist/bundle.js

author: Bert Spaan
